name: Waldorf Salad
description: A classic American salad with crisp apples, celery, grapes, and walnuts in a creamy mayonnaise dressing.

ingredients.item: Pinch of freshly ground black pepper
1 cup red seedless grapes, sliced in half (or 1/4 cup of raisins)

instructions: In a medium sized bowl, whisk together the mayonnaise, lemon juice, salt and pepper.
Stir in the apple, celery, grapes,
